Exetron System Project

0.1

Introduction

The Exetron System Project (ESP) is a PHP5 based framework for Application.

The main goal is to provide fully Object Oriented Applications in PHP. In fact, unless it is design more specifically for Web applications, it may be used also for system applications developpement.

It provides classes for all basic features like databases abstraction, sessions management and over...
